FAU is starting Germany's first undergraduate program combining AI and Materials Science under the name [KI-Materialtechnologie](https://www.mat.studium.fau.de/neu-ki-materialtechnologie/).
Philipp becomes Chair of the Study Commission of the new program in October 2024.
